General.Name: Siam Steel Service Center Public Company Limited
General.Description: Siam Steel Service Center Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells steel accessories in Thailand and internationally. The company offers cutting sheets and slitting coils; and coated corrugated sheets for construction industries. It also provides metal roofing and wall panel installation, and steel cutting services; and special production and services. The company serves its customers in construction, automobile, electrical appliance, electronics, and furniture industries, etc. Siam Steel Service Center Public Company Limited was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Samut Prakan, Thailand.
General.Address: 51/3 Moo 2 Poochaosamingprai Road, Samut Prakan, Thailand, 10130
